content: I think it'll work out. I'll just need to push the sofa back a bit to make some extra space. And I like the idea of adding some smaller decorative pieces to the bookshelf to balance out the room. Thanks for the advice! Now, can you help me with something else? I've been trying to get into meal prepping on Sundays, and I was wondering if you have any tips for organizing my kitchen to make meal prep more efficient.
